content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://inadaylake.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi/factsale-parquet/2012/Q1/InvoiceDateKey=2012-01-01/part-00007-2d3babe9-5131-4b02-bc6c-9ad747e31499.c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://inadaylake.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi/factsale-parquet/2012/Q1/*/*',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
